title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 360.2 - Definition of school year
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 360.2 - Definition of school year

State Regulations

Individuals covered by this Part, as described in section
360.1
of this Part, shall be
considered to have been employed full-time for an entire school year for
service crediting purposes if and only if they have been reported by the
employer to the Retirement System as being paid on the payroll for not less
than 170 days (including paid vacation and paid holidays) between July 1st of
any calendar year and June 30th of the following calendar
year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
360.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
